Name: Coptic textile
Description: Fragment of cloth in woollen tapestry of different colours. The decoration consists of a central design of interwoven open flowers of various colours, framed by two lateral bands on each side. On the inner one, between green and yellow stripes, we find a volute in the shape of an S; on the outer one, which has sustained a lot of damage, vegetal elements in the shape of stylized buds.
